column1: Nothing is known about him, other than he was the father of [[Saeros]], a Green-elf of [[Arthórien]] who was in [[Thingol]]'s court in [[Menegroth]].<ref>{{UT
His name is not given an explanation but is apparently composed of the [[Sindarin]] words ''[[Ithil]]'' + ''-[[paur]]''.
